def is_alt(s):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    vowel_pattern = '[aeiou]'
    consonant_pattern = '[bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz]'
    vowel_matches = re.finditer(vowel_pattern, s)
    consonant_matches = re.finditer(consonant_pattern, s)
    vowel_indices = [match.start() for match in vowel_matches]
    consonant_indices = [match.start() for match in consonant_matches]
    vowel_indices.sort()
    consonant_indices.sort()
    for i in range(len(vowel_indices) - 1):
        if vowel_indices[i] + 1 != consonant_indices[i]:
            return False
    for i in range(len(consonant_indices) - 1):
        if consonant_indices[i] + 1 != vowel_indices[i]:
            return False
    return True

def is_alt(s):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    vowel_pattern = '^([' + vowels + '][^' + vowels + '])*([' + vowels + ']|$)'
    consonant_pattern = '^([^' + vowels + '][' + vowels + '])*([^' + vowels + ']|$)'
    if re.match(vowel_pattern, s) or re.match(consonant_pattern, s):
        return True
    return False

def is_alt(s):
    vowels = "aeiou"
    vowels_pattern = "^[" + vowels + ")]"
    consonants_pattern = "^[^" + vowels + ")]"
    match_vowels = re.fullmatch("(" + vowels_pattern + consonants_pattern + ")*" + vowels_pattern + "?", s)
    match_consonants = re.fullmatch("(" + consonants_pattern + vowels_pattern + ")*" + consonants_pattern + "?", s)
    return bool(match_vowels or match_consonants)

def is_alt(s):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    vowel_pattern = '[aeiou]'
    consonant_pattern = '[^aeiou]'
    
    vowel_matches = re.finditer(vowel_pattern, s)
    consonant_matches = re.finditer(consonant_pattern, s)
    
    vowel_positions = [match.start() for match in vowel_matches]
    consonant_positions = [match.start() for match in consonant_matches]
    
    vowel_positions.sort()
    consonant_positions.sort()
    
    return vowel_positions == [x for x in range(len(s)) if x % 2 == 0] or consonant_positions == [x for x in range(len(s)) if x % 2 != 0]

def is_alt(s):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    alt = True
    prev_type = None
    
    for char in s:
        curr_type = 'vowel' if char in vowels else 'consonant'
        if curr_type == prev_type:
            alt = False
            break
        prev_type = curr_type
    
    return alt

def is_alt(s):
    vowels = "aeiou"
    alt = True
    prev_is_vowel = s[0] in vowels
    for char in s[1:]:
        curr_is_vowel = char in vowels
        if curr_is_vowel == prev_is_vowel:
            alt = False
            break
        prev_is_vowel = curr_is_vowel
    return alt

def is_alt(s):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    vowel_pattern = '[aeiou]'
    consonant_pattern = '[^aeiou]'
    
    vowel_matches = re.finditer(vowel_pattern, s)
    consonant_matches = re.finditer(consonant_pattern, s)
    
    vowel_positions = [match.start() for match in vowel_matches]
    consonant_positions = [match.start() for match in consonant_matches]
    
    vowel_positions.sort()
    consonant_positions.sort()
    
    for i in range(len(vowel_positions) - 1):
        if vowel_positions[i] + 1 != consonant_positions[i]:
            return False
            
    for i in range(len(consonant_positions) - 1):
        if consonant_positions[i] + 1 != vowel_positions[i]:
            return False
            
    return True

def is_alt(s):
    vowels = 'aeiou'
    pattern = re.compile(r'([aeiou][bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz]|[bcdfghjklmnpqrstvwxyz][aeiou])')
    return pattern.fullmatch(s) is not None
